titlestmt.titleproper: Partial Inventory of the Torcuato S. Di Tella collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff and Torcuato S. Di Tella

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-02-13T16:15-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Revised to add descriptions of microfilm reels by Di Tella found in collection file by Liz Phillips.

did.abstract: Serial issues and pamphlets published by Peronist, socialist, communist, anarchist and trade union organizations in Argentina relating to political and economic conditions in Argentina. In part, microfilm.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Torcuato S. Di Tella collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1997.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: In part, originals in possession of: T. S. Di Tella.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Serial issues and pamphlets published by Peronist, socialist, communist, anarchist and trade union organizations in Argentina, relating to political and economic conditions in Argentina. In part, microfilm.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids note
otherfindaid.p: Downloadable pdf file of microfilm reel inventory for boxes 1 (reels 1-15) and 3 (reels 16-28), including notes from Di Tella about the contents Microfilm reel inventory

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Serial issues and pamphlets in paper form not yet described.
